name: STS Arena Dev (x86_64)
postCreateCommand: npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code @beads/bd && echo 'NOTE: You need to set up lib/ with game JARs. See CLAUDE.md for paths.' && mvn dependency:resolve || true
postStartCommand: sudo mkdir -p /home/vscode/.claude /home/vscode/.ssh && sudo rsync -a --copy-links --exclude='debug' /mnt/host-claude/ /home/vscode/.claude/ && sudo cp /mnt/host-claude.json /home/vscode/.claude.json && sudo rsync -a --copy-links /mnt/host-ssh/ /home/vscode/.ssh/ && sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /home/vscode/.claude /home/vscode/.ssh /home/vscode/.claude.json && chmod 700 /home/vscode/.ssh && chmod 600 /home/vscode/.ssh/*
